column1: text
India is an Asian country.
Water boils at 100°C at sea level.
The Sun rises in the east.
Mount Everest is the highest peak in the world.
Oxygen is necessary for human survival.
Bananas are a rich source of potassium.
The Earth revolves around the Sun.
Paris is the capital of France.
Gold is a metal.
Penguins are birds that cannot fly.
New Delhi is the capital of India.
Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun.
A week has seven days.
A leap year has 366 days.
Spiders have eight legs.
The speed of sound in air is about 343 meters per second at 20°C.
Copper conducts electricity.
Photosynthesis uses sunlight to make food in plants.
Earth has one natural satellite
The human body is mostly water.
Computers process information using binary digits.
The Ganges is a river in India.
The Red Fort is in Delhi.
The Himalayas span multiple countries in Asia.
The capital of Spain is Madrid.
The Great Barrier Reef lies off Australia’s coast.
Mars is known as the Red Planet.
Lightning is an electrical discharge.
Honeybees live in colonies.
The equator divides Earth into two hemispheres.
The primary colors of light are red
Sound cannot travel through a vacuum.
The ozone layer absorbs most ultraviolet radiation from the Sun.
Table salt is composed of sodium and chloride.
The binary representation of the number 2 is 10.
H2O is the chemical formula for water.
The largest continent is Asia.
The smallest prime number is 2.
Birds lay eggs.
Camels store fat in their humps.
The Indian Rupee is the currency of India.
The Prime Meridian passes through Greenwich
The human lungs enable breathing.
Photosynthesis releases oxygen.
Rain forms from condensed water vapor.
Polar bears live in the Arctic.
The peacock is the national bird of India.
The World Wide Web was proposed in 1989.
The boiling point of water decreases at higher altitudes.
Earthquakes occur along faults in Earth’s crust.
The pancreas helps regulate blood sugar.
Tooth enamel is the hardest substance in the human body.
The Amazon River is in South America.
Many European countries use the euro.
Jupiter is the largest planet in the solar system.
Diamonds are a crystal form of carbon.
February is the shortest month of the year.
Binary search works on sorted data.
Solar panels convert sunlight into electricity.
Milk contains calcium.
Sun Temperature is 6000 Degree Celsius.
